price: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ṣíwájú kí Ó tó sọ̀ ọ́ kalẹ̀ fún wọn, wọ́n ti sọ̀rètí nù ṣíwájú rẹ̀.
arabic: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kānū min qabli an yunazzala ʿalayhim min qablihi lamub'lisīna
